structure.unit: PART 9 - PARKS, RECREATION AND CULTURAL AFFAIRS

law.text: It is understood that coordination between the Public Art Program and City construction management is vital to achieve timely completion of CIP projects. In order to achieve this cooperation the chair of the ASP for a particular project shall make every effort to expedite the public art side of a project and the City construction management staff and arts staff shall cooperate fully with the project ASP. The City shall include in any professional service RFP or RFQ language that indicates one or more artists may be included on the design team and will be selected by an independent process. The project architect shall be informed during negotiations for the architect's professional services of the requirement for artist involvement in the process which may include the artist on the project design team. Any unresolved conflict shall be decided directly by the City Council. (Ord. No. 2009-563, ยง2, 3-17-09, eff. 7-1-09)
